name: Baby Train 3D Premium
description:
This is a beautiful 3D game of trains. It is carefully mainly designed for babies (3years+) and kids. However, it is great for all the family too (no age limit!).

Baby Train 3D includes a powerfull editor that allows you to customize the train wagons and the train tracks. You can also load 7 different examples directly from the main menu.
The game is really easy. The goal is having fun, nothing else!

You can choose train speed, switch the camera, play choo choo sound, and click the special tracks for some basic action.

List of premium features:
- Larger trains! Now you can add +5 extra wagons, making a max total train length of 10.
- Larger tracks! Now you can add +100 aditional pieces to your custom tracks, making a max total track length of 200.
- More kind of wagons: +2 kind of wagons.
- More kind of track pieces: +3 kind of wagons.
- Load/save buttons for the editor! It will allow you to save and load your tracks using 10 different slots.

If you like wooden trains then we hope you will like this game!
